Name: Demon Cry
Desc: Instantly unleashes latent power to threaten surrounding enemies and inflict great damage. Blinds the target to reduce DEF, ATT, and Accuracy while increasing EXP OBTAINED and ITEM DROP RATE.

H.Old:
HP Cost: 400. Force Cost: 30. Threatens and attacks up to 15 enemies at 515% DAMAGE 7 times.
Targets' ATT/DEF -15% and Accuracy -20% and OBTAINED EXP/ITEM DROP RATE +20% for 60 sec.
Cooldown: 6 sec.
